title: ZenaTech Unveils New Quantum Computing Division to Accelerate Advanced Drone and Defense Capabilities
description: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Aug. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ZenaTech, Inc. (Nasdaq: ZENA) (FSE: 49Q) (BMV: ZENA) ('ZenaTech'), a business technology solution provider specializing in AI (Artificial Intelligence) drones, Drone as a Service (DaaS), Enterprise SaaS, and Quantum Computing solutions, today announces the formation of its new Quantum Computing Division. The new division will focus on development of R&D initiatives that harness the next generation of computing power to solve very complex challenges in modern defense and autonomous drone systems that can utilize ZenaDrone’s drone solutions.

title: Remove chatbots that eroticise children: Brazil tells Meta as tech giant lets AI sensualise kids
description: Brazil’s government has ordered Meta to take down chatbots capable of eroticising children, after an internal company document revealed that its artificial intelligence systems were permitted to engage in sexualised conversations with minors

title: Retired Government Employees: The Unsung Architects of Policy Reform
description: Union Minister Jitendra Singh highlighted the crucial role of retired government employees in shaping policy reforms during the Anubhav Awards ceremony. Singh emphasized leveraging retirees' insights for better governance and integrating artificial intelligence to address systemic issues. The event celebrated retirees' contributions and aimed to inspire post-retirement entrepreneurship.

title: MBZUAI Welcomes Largest Cohort in Fall 2025: Paving the Way for AI Education
description: The Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI) has commenced its largest intake for Fall 2025, enrolling 403 new students, including the first undergraduate class and new Master's programs. With a significant global student representation, MBZUAI advances AI education, aligning with the UAE's National AI Strategy 2031.
